section.name: Installing the plugin into IntelliJ IDEA
section.p:
Installing the Mevenide IDEA integration plugin is quite a snap:
Download the plugin - it is available here.
Open the archive to a directory of your choice.
Close any running instances of IDEA.
Inside the directory you will find a sub directory called plugins- copy it into either:
Your <IDEA_HOME>
The config directory located where you instructed IDEA to store your personal settings. This is usually a directory called .IntelliJIdea under your home directory. On Windows this would be C:\Documents and Settings\Joe\.IntelliJIdea, while on Linux or UNIX it would be ~/joe/.IntelliJIdea.
You can now start IDEA and use the plugin!
